=================
sensortoolkit API
=================

.. note::

    The API documentation is currently under development. Please check for
    updates to the BitBucket repository before referencing this section.

Below is listing of sub-packages (in red) contained within `sensortoolkit`. Each sub-package
contains a number of modules (python files containing various functions). Click
on sub-package names to view the modules and functions contained therein.

.. toctree::
    :caption: sensortoolkit Subpackages
    :titlesonly:
    :maxdepth: 1

    calculate
    datetime_utils
    deploy
    evaluation_objs
    ingest
    lib_utils
    model
    param
    plotting
    qc
    reference
    testing_attrib_objs
